title: 衞生署呼籲市民切勿購買或使用含有未標示受管制成分的外用產品（附圖）
news_content:
衞生署今日（六月十七日）呼籲市民切勿購買或使用四款含有未標示受管制藥物成分的外用產品，這些產品包括：




產品名稱
發現含有的第1部毒藥


1. 「昱顺新升级藏药癣毒王草本乳膏」
「丙酸氯倍他索」、「酮康唑」及「咪康唑」


2. 「昱顺苗药毒痒王抑菌乳膏」
「丙酸氯倍他索」、「酮康唑」及「咪康唑」


3. 「合生美狼毒王二十四味草本乳膏」
「丙酸氯倍他索」、「酮康唑」及「咪康唑」


4. 「昱顺中华真菌王抑菌乳膏」
「丙酸氯倍他索」及「咪康唑」




衞生署根據情報，從一個位於屯門的零售檔位取得上述產品樣本作化驗。政府化驗所的檢驗結果顯示，上述產品的樣本含有為《藥劑業及毒藥條例》（第138章）下的第1部毒藥的未標示受管制藥物成分。有關產品亦懷疑屬未經註冊藥劑製品。衞生署聯同警方今日到涉事處所採取執法行動。行動中，一名51歲女子涉嫌非法售賣及管有第1部毒藥及未經註冊藥劑製品被捕。衞生署的調查仍在進行中。

「丙酸氯倍他索」是用於治療炎症的類固醇藥物，不適當使用類固醇會引致皮膚問題及系統性的副作用如滿月臉、高血壓、高血糖、腎上腺機能不全和骨質疏鬆等。含有「丙酸氯倍他索」的產品屬處方藥物，須在醫生指示下使用，亦只可在註冊藥劑師監督下於獲授權毒藥銷售商（即藥房）憑醫生處方購買。「酮康唑」及「咪康唑」用於治療真菌感染，副作用包括局部皮膚刺激及過敏反應。含有「酮康唑」及「咪康唑」的外用產品只可在註冊藥劑師監督下於藥房出售。

根據《條例》，所有藥劑製品須獲香港藥劑業及毒藥管理局註冊，方可於市面銷售。非法售賣或管有未經註冊藥劑製品或第1部毒藥均屬刑事罪行，每項罪行一經定罪最高罰款100,000元及監禁兩年。

衞生署強烈呼籲市民切勿購買或使用成分或來歷不明的產品。所有已註冊的藥劑製品必須在包裝上附有香港註冊編號，格式為「HK-XXXXX」。未經註冊藥劑製品的安全、素質及效能均未獲保證。

已購買相關產品的市民應立即停止使用，如有疑問或使用後感到不適，應立即徵詢醫護人員的意見。市民可於辦公時間內，將有關產品交予九龍彌敦道345號永安九龍中心18樓1804-06室衞生署藥物辦公室銷毀。

title: Public urged not to buy or use topical products containing undeclared controlled ingredients (with photo)
news_content:
The Department of Health (DH) today (June 17) appealed to the public not to buy or use four types of topical products as they were found to contain undeclared controlled drug ingredients. These products include:




Product name
Part 1 poisons found


1. Zangyao xuanduwang
Clobetasol propionate, ketoconazole and miconazole


2. King poison to itch Antibacterial cream
Clobetasol propionate, ketoconazole and miconazole


3. HE SHENG MEI LANG DU WANG
Clobetasol propionate, ketoconazole and miconazole


4. ZHONG HUA ZHEN JUN WANG Antibacterial cream
Clobetasol propionate and miconazole




Acting upon intelligence, the DH has collected samples of the above-mentioned products from a retail stall in Tuen Mun for analysis. Test results from the Government Laboratory revealed that the above products contained undeclared controlled drug ingredients, which are Part 1 poisons under the Pharmacy and Poisons Ordinance (Cap. 138). These products are also suspected to be unregistered pharmaceutical products. The DH, in collaboration with the Police, took enforcement action at the premises today. During the operation, a 51-year-old woman was arrested for suspected illegal sale and possession of Part 1 poisons and unregistered pharmaceutical products. The DH's investigation is still ongoing.

Clobetasol propionate is a steroid substance for treating inflammation. Inappropriate application of steroids could cause skin problems and systemic side effects such as moon face, high blood pressure, high blood sugar, adrenal insufficiency and osteoporosis. Products containing clobetasol propionate are prescription medicines that should be used under a doctor's directions and be supplied in the premises of an Authorized Seller of Poisons (i.e. a pharmacy) under the supervision of a registered pharmacist upon a doctor's prescription. Ketoconazole and miconazole are used for the treatment of fungal infections with side effects including local irritation and sensitivity reactions. Topical products containing ketoconazole and miconazole should be supplied in a pharmacy under the supervision of a registered pharmacist.

According to the Ordinance, all pharmaceutical products must be registered with the Pharmacy and Poisons Board of Hong Kong before they can be sold in the market. Illegal sale or possession of unregistered pharmaceutical products or Part 1 poisons is a criminal offence. Upon conviction, the maximum penalty for each offence is a fine of $100,000 and two years' imprisonment.

The DH strongly urged members of the public not to buy or use products of doubtful composition or from unknown sources. All registered pharmaceutical products should carry a Hong Kong registration number on the package in the format of "HK-XXXXX". The safety, quality and efficacy of unregistered pharmaceutical products are not guaranteed.

People who have purchased the products concerned should stop using them immediately and consult healthcare professionals if in doubt or if they feel unwell after use. They may submit the products to the Drug Office of the DH at Room 1804-06, 18/F, Wing On Kowloon Centre, 345 Nathan Road, Kowloon, during office hours for disposal.

title: Speech by DCS at special session of "The Great Unity - Civilisation of the Qin and Han Dynasties in Shaanxi Province" Exhibition (English only) (with photos)
news_content:
Following is the speech by the Deputy Chief Secretary for Administration, Mr Cheuk Wing-hing, at a special session of "The Great Unity - Civilisation of the Qin and Han Dynasties in Shaanxi Province" Exhibition today (June 17):

The Honourable Commissioner Cui Jianchun (Commissioner of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region), Mr Gary Chan (Legislative Council Member),Ms Starry Lee (Legislative Council Member), Mr Holden Chow (Legislative Council Member), Acting Secretary Lau (Acting Secretary for Culture, Sports and Tourism, Mr Raistlin Lau), Director Chan (Director of Leisure and Cultural Services, Ms Manda Chan), consuls-general, distinguished guests, ladies and gentlemen,

It is great pleasure to welcome you to this special session of "The Hong Kong Jockey Club Series: The Great Unity - Civilisation of the Qin and Han Dynasties in Shaanxi Province" Exhibition.

President Xi Jinping has, on many occasions, made important remarks on strengthening the protection and inheritance of cultural heritage, and promoting China’s magnificent traditional culture. Hong Kong has an important role to play here: deeply rooted in traditional Chinese culture and extensively connected to the international communities, we are well positioned as the East-meets-West centre for international cultural exchange to promote Chinese culture and history to the world and encourage mutual learning across nations and regions.

The Hong Kong SAR (Special Administrative Region) Government established the Chinese Culture Promotion Office (CCPO) last year. The CCPO is dedicated to promoting Chinese culture and history-related activities, exchanges and collaborations, thereby enhancing the public’s cultural confidence and national identity. In collaboration with the Hong Kong Museum of History, the CCPO launched in 2024 the first flagship project - the "General History of China Series" - for the public to gain a more comprehensive understanding of the development of Chinese civilisation. Last year, the first exhibition in the series, "The Hong Kong Jockey Club Series: The Ancient Civilisation of the Xia, Shang and Zhou Dynasties in Henan Province" and the inaugural Chinese Culture Festival have attracted more than 1 million in physical attendance, including 10 000 teachers and students, in the same place that we are standing today.

Following that remarkable success, "The Hong Kong Jockey Club Series: The Great Unity - Civilisation of the Qin and Han Dynasties in Shaanxi Province" is the much yearned for second major exhibition in the General History of China Series. Qin and Han, spanning the 440 years from 221 BC to 220 AD, were two dynasties of immense significance. The Qin period saw the first unification of China in terms of adopting: political centralism, the system of prefectures and counties, "li shu" as the common written words, common currency, common weights and measures etc. Whereas the Han period saw the defeat of neighbouring and invading foreign tribes, the expansion of the national boundary, the prosperity of external trade via the Silk Road, and the adoption of Confucianism as the orthodox thinking and value etc. These developments profoundly influenced the course of China’s development for over 2,000 years.

The capital of Qin and Western Han was respectively Xianyang and Changan, which are today’s Xianyang and Xi’an in the province of Shaanxi. With the staunch and generous support of the Shaanxi Provincial Cultural Heritage Administration, about 110 sets of priceless exhibits from Shaanxi, including figures from the world-renowned terracotta army of Emperor Qin Shi-huang (ç§¦å§ç), and warrior and animal figurines of Emperor Jing (æ¼¢æ¯å¸), the sixth emperor of Western Han, are presented in this exhibition. Among the exhibits, 11 are grade-one national treasures brought to Hong Kong under the auspices of Shaanxi Province, with four on exhibition outside Mainland China for the first time. We earnestly hope that the wide array of exhibits will give our distinguished guests today a taste of the grandeur of the two dynasties and a deeper appreciation of the richness and beauty of traditional Chinese culture.

I wish to extend my heartfelt gratitude to the Office of the Commissioner of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in the Hong Kong SAR and the Democratic Alliance for the Betterment and Progress of Hong Kong for organising this special viewing session. I look forward to having more exhibitions of national treasures from different Chinese provinces in Hong Kong under the General History of China Series to further introduce Chinese culture and history to the global audience.

In closing, I hope you like the exhibition and have a delightful afternoon meeting the art pieces from 2 000 years ago. Thank you very much.

news_content:
The following is issued on behalf of the Hong Kong Monetary Authority:

Bank
Type of Scam

Fraudulent website and internet banking login screen

title: STL visits Shanghai (with photos)
news_content:
âThe Secretary for Transport and Logistics, Ms Mable Chan, paid a two-day visit to Shanghai and met with local government officials as well as trade representatives on transport and logistics issues.

Upon her arrival yesterday (June 16), Ms Chan first had a meeting with the Director of the Shanghai Municipal Transportation Commission, Mr Yu Fulin, and other officials to exchange views on issues of mutual interest, including traffic management, shipping and aviation. She also visited an all-electric ferry, which commenced operation in April, to learn about Shanghai's progress in promoting green transport.

She subsequently met with representatives of the China Shipowners' Association to give an overview of the latest developments of Hong Kong's maritime services. She encouraged Mainland shipowners and shipping enterprises to register their ships in Hong Kong. Hong Kong ranks fourth globally in shipping registration and the quality of the Hong Kong flag has long been internationally renowned, with its port detention rate consistently among the top three lowest in the world. Additionally, the Government will introduce tax concessions for commodity trading, further generating new impetus for the maritime services sector. Combined with the market influence of Mainland shipowners and the shipping sector, this initiative will reinforce the influence of the country in the international shipping community.

Ms Chan visited the Yangshan Port in Shanghai today (June 17) to gain insights into the operations of its automated terminal. She said, "The Port of Shanghai and ports in Hong Kong are advancing in unison towards greening, digitalisation and adoption of smart technologies. The visit has deepened exchanges between the two sides on high-quality port development and allowed us to draw on Yangshan Port's experience to facilitate discussions with port operators on a roadmap for the smart transformation of Hong Kong's ports. The Port of Shanghai leverages technology to drive port development, and I look forward to further strengthening exchanges and co-operation with it in the future, consolidating and enhancing Hong Kong's strengths as the 'southern gateway' of the country."

She continued that Shanghai and Hong Kong are both vital shipping centres to the country, ranking third and fourth respectively in the 2024 Xinhua-Baltic International Shipping Centre Development Index Report. She expressed hope that through this visit and exchanges, both cities can work together to strive toward the country's strategic goal of becoming a maritime powerhouse and explore opportunities for deeper collaboration.

Ms Chan concluded her duty visit to Shanghai and returned to Hong Kong this afternoon.

title: 勞工及福利局局長為《香港國安法》公布實施5周年社福界分享會主禮致辭（只有中文）
news_content:
勞工及福利局（勞福局）、社會福利署（社署）和香港社福界心連心大行動（心連心）今日（六月十七日）聯合舉辦《香港國安法》公布實施5周年社福界分享會。勞福局局長孫玉菡為分享會主禮。以下是孫玉菡在分享會上的致辭全文：

管浩鳴主席（心連心董事會主席）、彭韻僖律師Melissa（第十四屆全國政協委員）、譚贛蘭教授Annie（心連心學院院長）、范凱傑教授Alex（心連心董事）、各位嘉賓、各位同業、各位社福界的好朋友：

我很高興今天出席由勞福局、社署和心連心聯合舉辦的《香港國安法》公布實施5周年社福界分享會。剛才司儀提到，除了300位現場出席的人士外，線上還有約6 000位朋友一起參與，再一次顯示社福界十分團結，所有關於國情和《香港國安法》，當然還有關於業界的事，大家均會全力參與。

過去數年的發展，尤其是在實施《香港國安法》方面，足足見證我們社福界是其中一個做得最到位、最實際及最好的業界。今年六月三十日將是《香港國安法》在香港特別行政區公布實施5周年，時間過得很快，為響應這個重要日子，做好宣傳教育工作，勞福局及社署聯合社福界推展一系列活動，包括由六月初開始，於社福機構網站及宣傳品等，使用《香港國安法》公布實施5周年宣傳教育活動的主視覺設計key visual，以及在社福服務單位張貼宣傳海報及展示宣傳品，目的是除了管理層和社工外，希望讓前線員工和服務使用者也接觸更多關於《香港國安法》實施的資訊。另外，我跟團隊亦會在六月二十三日，與179間接受我們恆常資助的社福機構一起參觀《香港國安法》公布實施5周年專題展覽及國家安全展覽廳。我期望社福界對《香港國安法》有更深入的認識，並自覺地維護國家安全。

各位也留意到，隨着過去幾年《香港國安法》的實施，社署已將《香港國安法》及《維護國家安全條例》列入受社署資助服務的「服務質素標準」相關文件；亦在服務規格說明書、服務協議、物料供應及採購規定等加入維護國家安全的必要條文，從實際上做好國家安全的工作。此外，在申請舉辦籌款活動包括賣旗等的指引中，均列明大家有責任去維護國家安全。去年十月社署出版的新修訂本《社會福利服務整筆撥款津助手冊》中，當中亦納入對《香港國安法》的要求，確保大家有遵守《香港國安法》及《維護國家安全條例》的責任。不得不提的還有我們於去年完成修訂《社會工作者註冊條例》，進一步完善社會工作者註冊局（註冊局）的管治。在修訂條例修訂後，註冊局積極在維護國安方面進行大量工作，包括建立機制，確保被裁定干犯危害國家安全罪行的人士的社工註冊得到迅速及適當的處理。

在各項優化機制的基礎上，業界不斷提升維護國家安全的意識，並確保在向市民提供日常服務時，恪守維護國家安全的法律和條例。我很高興過去數年我們整體社福界，從頂層的設計到日常運作，均確保大家自覺遵守《香港國安法》的要求，並自覺在日常運作的層面確保做到維護國家安全的責任。

勞福局、社署及心連心持續推廣國家安全教育及宣揚愛國情懷。在過去一年，我們舉辦了多項國安和愛國主義教育相關活動，包括在座很多人也有參與的「二十屆三中全會精神研習班」，有約超過4 800人參與；我們舉辦的國慶社福薈萃晚宴，亦有超過1 000人參與，我也在場見到全場爆滿；與社福機構主席及總幹事參觀國家安全展覽廳，這包括所有179個津助機構；以及剛於四月舉辦的香港社福界維護國家安全研討會，線上線下共有超過8 000人參與，所有活動也彰顯我們社福界在維護國家安全方面的積極性。

社署去年五月推出專項基金，資助營辦津助福利服務的機構進行員工培訓及系統提升，當中特別預留1億元資助機構安排員工參加內地交流團及國情研習課程，加強他們對國家事務的認識。各機構透過專項基金的資助，至今已申請了20項有關認識國家事務、維護國家安全和相關法例及探訪交流的培訓項目。而大家相當熟悉的「香港萬千社工看祖國」交流團，至今已經舉辦了四團，約1 400人曾參與，參加者不單對國家的總體發展得到更深、更全面的了解，亦獲得不少專業上的啓發，並跟內地的同工有更深入的交流。

我自己亦於五月參與「香港大專社工老師看祖國」廣州交流團的首發團，首天我現場出席，這個交流團包括本港全部17所有開辦社工課程的大專機構均有代表參加，顯示學術界亦積極認識和配合我們《香港國安法》方面的工作。

今天研討會內容十分豐富，大會邀請了第十四屆全國政協委員彭韻僖律師，以及心連心董事范凱傑教授，分別與大家就《香港國安法》作主題演講。另外，我們尊敬的心連心學院院長Annie亦會以別開生面的問答遊戲方式，深入淺出地加深大家對《香港國安法》的認識。我相信透過今次的分享會，大家將會對《香港國安法》的內容和認知有更深入的了解並得到啓發。

最後，我藉此機會祝願今日的活動圓滿成功，各位身體健康、工作順利。多謝大家。

管浩鳴主席（心連心董事會主席）、彭韻僖律師Melissa（第十四屆全國政協委員）、譚贛蘭教授Annie（心連心學院院長）、范凱傑教授Alex（心連心董事）、各位嘉賓、各位同業、各位社福界的好朋友：

我很高興今天出席由勞福局、社署和心連心聯合舉辦的《香港國安法》公布實施5周年社福界分享會。剛才司儀提到，除了300位現場出席的人士外，線上還有約6 000位朋友一起參與，再一次顯示社福界十分團結，所有關於國情和《香港國安法》，當然還有關於業界的事，大家均會全力參與。

過去數年的發展，尤其是在實施《香港國安法》方面，足足見證我們社福界是其中一個做得最到位、最實際及最好的業界。今年六月三十日將是《香港國安法》在香港特別行政區公布實施5周年，時間過得很快，為響應這個重要日子，做好宣傳教育工作，勞福局及社署聯合社福界推展一系列活動，包括由六月初開始，於社福機構網站及宣傳品等，使用《香港國安法》公布實施5周年宣傳教育活動的主視覺設計key visual，以及在社福服務單位張貼宣傳海報及展示宣傳品，目的是除了管理層和社工外，希望讓前線員工和服務使用者也接觸更多關於《香港國安法》實施的資訊。另外，我跟團隊亦會在六月二十三日，與179間接受我們恆常資助的社福機構一起參觀《香港國安法》公布實施5周年專題展覽及國家安全展覽廳。我期望社福界對《香港國安法》有更深入的認識，並自覺地維護國家安全。

各位也留意到，隨着過去幾年《香港國安法》的實施，社署已將《香港國安法》及《維護國家安全條例》列入受社署資助服務的「服務質素標準」相關文件；亦在服務規格說明書、服務協議、物料供應及採購規定等加入維護國家安全的必要條文，從實際上做好國家安全的工作。此外，在申請舉辦籌款活動包括賣旗等的指引中，均列明大家有責任去維護國家安全。去年十月社署出版的新修訂本《社會福利服務整筆撥款津助手冊》中，當中亦納入對《香港國安法》的要求，確保大家有遵守《香港國安法》及《維護國家安全條例》的責任。不得不提的還有我們於去年完成修訂《社會工作者註冊條例》，進一步完善社會工作者註冊局（註冊局）的管治。在修訂條例修訂後，註冊局積極在維護國安方面進行大量工作，包括建立機制，確保被裁定干犯危害國家安全罪行的人士的社工註冊得到迅速及適當的處理。

在各項優化機制的基礎上，業界不斷提升維護國家安全的意識，並確保在向市民提供日常服務時，恪守維護國家安全的法律和條例。我很高興過去數年我們整體社福界，從頂層的設計到日常運作，均確保大家自覺遵守《香港國安法》的要求，並自覺在日常運作的層面確保做到維護國家安全的責任。

勞福局、社署及心連心持續推廣國家安全教育及宣揚愛國情懷。在過去一年，我們舉辦了多項國安和愛國主義教育相關活動，包括在座很多人也有參與的「二十屆三中全會精神研習班」，有約超過4 800人參與；我們舉辦的國慶社福薈萃晚宴，亦有超過1 000人參與，我也在場見到全場爆滿；與社福機構主席及總幹事參觀國家安全展覽廳，這包括所有179個津助機構；以及剛於四月舉辦的香港社福界維護國家安全研討會，線上線下共有超過8 000人參與，所有活動也彰顯我們社福界在維護國家安全方面的積極性。

社署去年五月推出專項基金，資助營辦津助福利服務的機構進行員工培訓及系統提升，當中特別預留1億元資助機構安排員工參加內地交流團及國情研習課程，加強他們對國家事務的認識。各機構透過專項基金的資助，至今已申請了20項有關認識國家事務、維護國家安全和相關法例及探訪交流的培訓項目。而大家相當熟悉的「香港萬千社工看祖國」交流團，至今已經舉辦了四團，約1 400人曾參與，參加者不單對國家的總體發展得到更深、更全面的了解，亦獲得不少專業上的啓發，並跟內地的同工有更深入的交流。

我自己亦於五月參與「香港大專社工老師看祖國」廣州交流團的首發團，首天我現場出席，這個交流團包括本港全部17所有開辦社工課程的大專機構均有代表參加，顯示學術界亦積極認識和配合我們《香港國安法》方面的工作。

今天研討會內容十分豐富，大會邀請了第十四屆全國政協委員彭韻僖律師，以及心連心董事范凱傑教授，分別與大家就《香港國安法》作主題演講。另外，我們尊敬的心連心學院院長Annie亦會以別開生面的問答遊戲方式，深入淺出地加深大家對《香港國安法》的認識。我相信透過今次的分享會，大家將會對《香港國安法》的內容和認知有更深入的了解並得到啓發。

最後，我藉此機會祝願今日的活動圓滿成功，各位身體健康、工作順利。多謝大家。

title: 勞工及福利局局長為《香港國安法》公布實施5周年社福界分享會主禮致辭（只有中文）（附圖）

title: Government announces second batch of projects supported by RAISe+ Scheme
news_content:
The Innovation and Technology Commission (ITC) announced today (June 17) the second batch of 25 projects recommended by the Steering Committee of the Research, Academic, and Industry Sectors One-plus (RAISe+) Scheme for funding support by the RAISe+ Scheme. The total funding amounts to over $1 billion.

The projects supported by the Scheme cover a wide range of innovation and technology (I&T) fields, including health and medical sciences, new materials and new energy, AI and robotics, electrical and electronic engineering, advanced manufacturing, Chinese medicine, and computer science/information technology (see Annex). These projects showcase Hong Kong's robust research and development (R&D) capability and the diverse development of its I&T ecosystem.

The Secretary for Innovation, Technology and Industry, Professor Sun Dong, welcomed the second batch of projects supported by the RAISe+ Scheme. He said, "The successful approval of the second batch of projects marks the Government's continued commitment to promote commercialisation of local R&D outcomes through the RAISe+ Scheme. The Scheme fosters effective collaboration among the Government, industry, academia and research sectors, injecting new momentum into local innovation and technology development which in turn expedites the development of Hong Kong into an international I&T centre."

The ITC will continue to work closely with the universities and industry for the smooth implementation of the projects supported by the RAISe+ Scheme, with the aspiration of nurturing more I&T projects and start-ups with potential through the Scheme, thereby further driving Hong Kong's high-quality development.

With a funding allocation of $10 billion, the RAISe+ Scheme was launched in 2023 and aims to fund at least 100 research teams, which are from universities funded by the University Grants Committee and have good potential to become successful start-ups on a matching basis. Funding support from $10 million to $100 million will be provided to each approved project. Assessment criteria include the I&T component of the project, the commercial viability of project outcomes, the technical and management capability of the team, relevance of the project with government policies or in the project's overall interest to the community, as well as the financial considerations of the project. The ITC announced the first batch of 24 projects supported by the RAISe+ Scheme in May 2024 with the total funding amounting to over $1 billion.

Details of the scheme are available on its dedicated website (www.itf.gov.hk/en/raiseplus). For enquiries, please contact the Secretariat of the scheme (Tel: 3655 5678; email: raiseplus@itc.gov.hk).

title: CSSA caseload for May 2025
news_content:
The overall Comprehensive Social Security Assistance (CSSA) caseload in May slightly rose by 11 cases, remaining more or less the same as that of April, according to the latest CSSA caseload statistics released by the Social Welfare Department today (June 17).

The total CSSA caseload at the end of May stood at 195 436 (see attached table), with a total of 261 668 recipients.

Analysed by case nature, low-earnings cases registered a month-to-month decrease of 0.9 per cent to 1 331 cases. Single parent cases dropped by 0.3 per cent to 18 882 cases. Permanent disability cases declined by 0.1 per cent to 16 597 cases.

Unemployment cases registered an increase of 0.4 per cent to 16 157 cases. Ill-health cases increased by 0.3 per cent to 27 775 cases. Old age cases remained steady at 110 773 cases.

title: 政府公布第二批獲「產學研1+計劃」支持的項目
news_content:
創新科技署今日（六月十七日）公布第二批25個獲「產學研1+計劃」督導委員會建議資助的項目，總資助金額超過10億元。

是次獲計劃支持的項目涵蓋多個創科範疇，包括健康及醫藥科學、新材料與新能源、人工智能與機械人、電機及電子工程、先進製造、中醫藥及計算機科學／資訊科技（名單見附件），充分展現本港科研實力及多元發展的創科生態圈。

創新科技及工業局局長孫東教授歡迎第二批獲「產學研1+計劃」支持的項目。他表示：「這次成功批出第二批項目，標誌着政府繼續透過『產學研1+計劃』全力推動本地科研成果商品化的決心。計劃促進『政、產、學、研』高效協作，為本港創科發展注入新動力，有助加快建設香港成為國際創科中心。」

創新科技署將繼續與大學及業界緊密合作，以期順利推展「產學研1+計劃」支持的項目，並期望計劃孕育更多具潛力的創科項目及初創企業，進一步推動香港的高質量發展。

獲撥款100億元的「產學研1+計劃」在二○二三年正式推出，以配對形式資助不少於100支來自大學教育資助委員會資助大學、有潛質成為成功初創企業的研發團隊。每個獲批項目可獲1,000萬元至一億元不等的資助。計劃的評審準則包括項目的創科內容、項目成果的商品化機會、團隊的技術及管理能力、項目能否配合政府政策或對整體社會有利及項目的財務因素。創新科技署於二○二四年五月公布首批獲計劃支持的24個項目，資助金額總值超過十億元。

有關計劃詳情載於相關網頁（www.itf.gov.hk/tc/raiseplus）。如有查詢，請聯絡計劃秘書處（電話：3655 5678；電郵：raiseplus@itc.gov.hk）。

title: 二○二五年五月份領取綜援個案數字
news_content:
社會福利署今日（六月十七日）發表最新的領取綜合社會保障援助（綜援）個案數字。五月份整體領取綜援的個案稍微增加11宗，與四月份數字相若。

五月底領取綜援的個案總數為195 436宗（詳見附表），受助總人數為261 668。

就個案類別分析，低收入類別個案的按月跌幅為0.9%，有1 331宗。單親類別個案下跌0.3%，有18 882宗。永久性殘疾類別個案下跌0.1%，有16 597宗。

失業類別個案則上升0.4%，有16 157宗。健康欠佳類別個案上升0.3%，有27 775宗。年老類別個案保持平穩，有110 773宗。

title: 東主因違反安全法例被判罰款
news_content:
剔鈎貨運物流有限公司因違反《工廠及工業經營條例》及《工廠及工業經營（起重機械及起重裝置）規例》的規定，被勞工處檢控，今日（六月十七日）在粉嶺裁判法院被判罰款十六萬二千元。

案情涉及一宗於二○二四年五月六日在元朗一個露天倉庫發生的致命意外。一捆金屬板被貨車式起重機吊起時，鬆脫掉落並擊中一名在地面協助進行該吊運工作的工人。工人同日在醫院離世。

title: 二零二五年三月至五月失業及就業不足統計數字
news_content:
根據政府統計處今日（六月十七日）發表的最新勞動人口統計數字（即二零二五年三月至五月的臨時數字），經季節性調整的失業率由二零二五年二月至四月的3.4%上升至二零二五年三月至五月的3.5%。就業不足率亦由二零二五年二月至四月的1.3%上升至二零二五年三月至五月的1.4%。

與二零二五年二月至四月比較，在二零二五年三月至五月期間，大多數主要經濟行業的失業率（不經季節性調整）均見上升，其中建造業，零售業和地產業有相對明顯的升幅。就業不足率方面，上升主要見於建造業和運輸業。

總就業人數由二零二五年二月至四月的3 677 100人，下跌至二零二五年三月至五月的3 664 700人，減少約12 400人。同期的總勞動人口亦由3 806 500人下跌至3 800 500人，減少約6 000人。

失業人數（不經季節性調整）由二零二五年二月至四月的129 400人上升至二零二五年三月至五月的135 800人，增加約6 400人。同期的就業不足人數亦由47 600人上升至53 600人，增加約6 000人。

評論

勞工及福利局局長孫玉菡評論最新失業數字時表示：「相較上一個三個月期間，二零二五年三月至五月經季節性調整的失業率微升0.1個百分點至3.5%。就業不足率亦微升0.1個百分點至1.4%。勞動人口和總就業人數分別進一步減少至3 800 500人和3 664 700人。」

展望未來，孫玉菡說：「在外圍環境持續存在不確定性，以及市民和旅客的消費模式轉變的背景下，不同行業的調整將繼續影響新增職位的速度。此外，未來數月會有新一批畢業生和離校人士投入勞工市場，或會進一步影響整體就業情況。然而，我們欣見香港經濟穩步擴張，今年實質本地生產總值增長預期為2%至3%，而且本地及外來註冊公司數目近月均創新高，反映本地及外地經營者繼續進駐香港市場。這些正面發展應會為勞工市場提供支持及維持香港經濟發展動力。」

進一步資料

失業和就業不足的統計數字，是根據持續進行的「綜合住戶統計調查」結果而編製。

統計調查所採用有關失業及就業不足的定義，緊隨國際勞工組織的建議。當中，就業人口涵蓋所有僱主、自營作業者、僱員（包括全職、兼職及散工等）和無酬家庭從業員。而按行業（或職業）劃分的失業人士是按其以前從事的行業（或職業）劃分。

二零二五年三月至五月的統計調查所用的樣本，是通過一個根據科學方法設計的抽樣系統選出，包括約26 000個住戶，共約68 000人，以代表本港人口的情況。根據這個樣本編製而成的勞工統計數字反映二零二五年三月至五月的移動三個月期間的情況。

統計調查是向樣本中各住戶內每名15歲或以上的成員進行訪問，以搜集有關勞動人口特徵的資料。

載列最新勞工統計數字的統計表可於政府統計處網站（www.censtatd.gov.hk/tc/scode200.html）下載。有關勞動人口特徵的詳細分析則刊載於每年出版四次的《綜合住戶統計調查按季統計報告》。最新一期的報告載列二零二五年一月至三月的統計數字，而涵蓋二零二五年四月至六月的一期將於二零二五年八月底出版。用戶亦可在政府統計處網站（www.censtatd.gov.hk/tc/EIndexbySubject.html?pcode=B1050001&scode=200）瀏覽及下載。

有關勞動人口統計數字的查詢，請聯絡政府統計處綜合住戶統計調查組（三）（電話：2887 5508或電郵：ghs@censtatd.gov.hk）。

title: Unemployment and underemployment statistics for March - May 2025
news_content:
According to the latest labour force statistics (i.e. provisional figures for March - May 2025) released today (June 17) by the Census and Statistics Department (C&SD), the seasonally adjusted unemployment rate increased from 3.4% in February - April 2025 to 3.5% in March - May 2025. The underemployment rate also increased from 1.3% in February - April 2025 to 1.4% in March - May 2025.

  Comparing March - May 2025 with February - April 2025, the unemployment rate (not seasonally adjusted) increased across most major economic sectors, with more distinct increases observed in the construction sector, retail sector and real estate sector. As to the underemployment rate, increases were mainly seen in the construction sector and transportation sector.

  Total employment decreased by around 12 400 from 3 677 100 in February - April 2025 to 3 664 700 in March - May 2025. Over the same period, the labour force also decreased by around 6 000 from 3 806 500 to 3 800 500.

  The number of unemployed persons (not seasonally adjusted) increased by around 6 400 from 129 400 in February - April 2025 to 135 800 in March - May 2025. Over the same period, the number of underemployed persons also increased by around 6 000 from 47 600 to 53 600.

Commentary

  Commenting on the latest unemployment figures, the Secretary for Labour and Welfare, Mr Chris Sun, said, "Compared with the preceding three-month period, the seasonally adjusted unemployment rate posted a modest uptick of 0.1 percentage point to 3.5% in March - May 2025. The underemployment rate also edged up by 0.1 percentage point to 1.4%. The labour force and total employment decreased further to 3 800 500 and 3 664 700 respectively."

  Looking ahead, Mr Chris Sun said, "The pace of job creation will continue to be affected by the evolvement of different industries amidst the continuing uncertain external environment and the changing consumption patterns of locals and visitors. Besides, the entry of fresh graduates and school leavers in the coming few months may further impact the overall employment situation. That said, we are delighted to see the steady expansion of the Hong Kong economy with real Gross Domestic Product in 2025 forecast to grow by 2% to 3%, and the injection of new impetus to the market by local and non-local operators as reflected by the numbers of registered local and foreign companies having reached new heights in recent months. These positive developments should render support to the labour market and sustain the momentum of Hong Kong's economic development."

Further information

  The unemployment and underemployment statistics were compiled from the findings of the continuous General Household Survey.

  In the survey, the definitions used in measuring unemployment and underemployment follow closely those recommended by the International Labour Organization. The employed population covers all employers, self-employed persons, employees (including full-time, part-time, casual workers, etc.) and unpaid family workers. Unemployed persons by industry (or occupation) are classified according to their previous industry (or occupation).

  The survey for March - May 2025 covered a sample of some 26 000 households or 68 000 persons, selected in accordance with a scientifically designed sampling scheme to represent the population of Hong Kong. Labour force statistics compiled from this sample represented the situation in the moving three-month period of March to May 2025.

  Data on labour force characteristics were obtained from the survey by interviewing each member aged 15 or over in the sampled households.

  Statistical tables on the latest labour force statistics can be downloaded at the website of the C&SD (www.censtatd.gov.hk/en/scode200.html). More detailed analysis of the labour force characteristics is given in the "Quarterly Report on General Household Survey” which is published four times a year. The latest issue of the report contains statistics for the quarter January - March 2025 while the next issue covering the quarter April - June 2025 will be available by end August 2025. Users can also browse and download this publication at the website of the C&SD (www.censtatd.gov.hk/en/EIndexbySubject.html?pcode=B1050001&scode=200).

  For enquiries about labour force statistics, please contact the General Household Survey Section (3) of the C&SD (Tel: 2887 5508 or email: ghs@censtatd.gov.hk).

title: Proprietor fined for violation of safety legislation
news_content:
Click-Out Cargo Logistics Company Limited was fined $162,000 at the Fanling Magistrates' Courts today (June 17) for violating the Factories and Industrial Undertakings Ordinance and the Factories and Industrial Undertakings (Lifting Appliances and Lifting Gear) Regulations. The prosecutions were launched by the Labour Department.

  The case involved a fatal accident that occurred on May 6, 2024, in an open yard in Yuen Long. A bundle of metal boards became loosened and fell while being lifted by a truck-mounted crane, striking a worker who was working on the ground to assist the lifting operation. The worker passed away in hospital on the same day.

title: ​香港在《2025年世界競爭力年報》位列全球最具競爭力的三大經濟體之一
news_content:
在國際管理發展學院最新發布的《2025年世界競爭力年報》（《2025年報》）中，香港的全球競爭力繼去年上升兩位至第五後，今年再上升兩位至全球第三。今次是自二○一九年後，香港首次重返全球三甲。

《2025年報》結果顯示，香港競爭力大幅提升，總得分在100分中獲99.2分，增加7.7分，增長幅度是頭十名經濟體中最高。

在《2025年報》的四個競爭力因素中，香港在「政府效率」和「營商效率」上升至全球第二；在「經濟表現」和「基礎建設」的排名亦分別上升至全球第六和第七。競爭力的子因素方面，香港在「稅務政策」和「商業法規」排名全球第一；「國際投資」、「教育」和「金融」排名全球第二；「國際貿易」和「管理方式」排名全球第三。

政府發言人今日（六月十七日）表示：「國際管理發展學院發布的《2025年報》，在綜合客觀數據以及商界意見等因素後，再次肯定香港為全球最具競爭力的經濟體之一，且排名持續上升。《2025年報》對香港整體評分和多個領域評分都上升，顯示特區政府的施政方向整體正確，各項政策取得了成效。其中，『政府效率』獲評為世界第二，這證明公務員本質和能力優秀，也反映行政長官改變政府文化，建立以結果為目標的政府政策是正確並帶來成果。在公務員的努力和管治團隊的領導下，政府能有效率做出成果，惠及市民，為市民帶來更好生活。而『營商效率』亦獲評為世界第二，反映商界領袖對香港競爭力的正面看法，以及香港的優勢，包括法治、法庭獨立審訊、簡單稅制、低稅率、市場高效透明、金融系統穩健、對標國際最高水平的便利營商環境，以及資金、資訊、貨物及人員自由流動等，獲得商界認同。」

發言人指出：「香港今年的經濟增長預計在百分之二至百分之三之間。在這大環境下，香港註冊公司數目再創高峰。香港正處於經濟轉型期，部分行業做得很好，也有部分行業面對挑戰，例如零售業和餐飲業。政府已宣布一系列措施支援中小企，並協助它們升級轉型，提升品牌及開拓新市場。」

「面對紛繁複雜的全球政經格局，香港會準確識變、科學應變、主動求變，繼續積極融入國家發展大局、對接好國家發展戰略，鞏固『超級聯繫人』和『超級增值人』的功能和角色，不斷強化政府治理體系、提升施政效能；並深化國際交往合作，做大做深區域貿易，開拓新市場，全面拼經濟、謀發展、惠民生。在國家的堅實支持下，香港必定能實現更高質量、更可持續的發展。」

title: Hong Kong ranks among world's top three most competitive economies in World Competitiveness Yearbook 2025
news_content:
In the latest World Competitiveness Yearbook (WCY) 2025 published by the International Institute for Management Development (IMD), Hong Kong's global competitiveness rises by two places further to third globally, after improving by two places to fifth last year. This marks Hong Kong's return to the global top three for the first time since 2019.

  WCY 2025 shows that Hong Kong's competitiveness improves significantly, with a total score of 99.2 out of 100 and an increase of 7.7 points, representing the largest increase among the global top 10 economies.

  Among the four competitiveness factors in WCY 2025, Hong Kong rises to second globally in "Government efficiency" and "Business efficiency". Its respective rankings in "Economic performance" and "Infrastructure" also improve to sixth and seventh globally. As regards the competitiveness sub-factors, Hong Kong tops the rankings in "Tax policy" and "Business legislation", and ranks second globally in "International investment", "Education" and "Finance", and third globally in "International trade" and "Management practices".

  A Government spokesperson said today (June 17), "Having taken into account a host of factors including objective data and business opinions, the IMD's WCY 2025 has reaffirmed Hong Kong as one of the most competitive economies in the world with a continuous rise in ranking. Hong Kong's scores in overall terms and in many areas have improved in WCY 2025, showing that the HKSAR Government's policy directions are on the right course and that various policies have yielded results. In particular, 'Government efficiency' is ranked second globally, which reflects the inherent excellence and competence of civil servants, and also validates that the change in government culture led by the Chief Executive to drive result-oriented policies has borne fruit. With the efforts of civil servants and the leadership of the governing team, the Government can efficiently deliver results that benefit our people and bring them better livelihoods. In addition, our ranking in 'Business efficiency' also comes second globally, reflecting business leaders' positive views on Hong Kong's competitiveness, as well as Hong Kong's strengths including the rule of law, independent exercise of judicial power, a simple tax system with low tax rates, an efficient and transparent market, a robust financial system, a facilitating business environment aligned with international best practices, and free flow of capital, information, goods and talent, which are affirmed by the business community."

  The spokesperson stated, "Hong Kong's economic growth this year is forecast to be 2 per cent to 3 per cent. Against this backdrop, the number of companies registered in Hong Kong reached a new high. Hong Kong is in a period of economic restructuring. Some industries are performing very well, while others, such as the retail and catering industries, are facing challenges. The Government has announced a series of measures to support small and medium-sized enterprises, assisting them in upgrading and transforming, enhancing their brands, and exploring new markets.

  "In the face of a complicated global economic and political landscape, Hong Kong will understand changes accurately, respond to changes scientifically, and embrace changes proactively. We will continue to actively integrate into the overall national development and align with national development strategies to consolidate our functional role as a 'super connector' and a 'super value-adder', while continuously strengthening our governance systems and governance efficacy. We will strengthen international exchanges and co-operation, expand and deepen regional trade, and explore new markets, with a view to building a vibrant economy, striving for development, and improving people's livelihoods on all fronts. With the staunch support of the country, Hong Kong is poised to achieve higher-quality and more sustainable development."

title: 發展局及工務部門榮獲九項英國「Martin Barnes」獎項（附圖）
news_content:
香港工務工程的卓越成就備受國際肯定。發展局及工務部門於六月十六日（倫敦時間）在英國倫敦舉行的二○二五年度新工程合約「Martin Barnes」獎項頒獎典禮上，從全球八十個參賽項目中脫穎而出，在八個組別共二十七個獎項中勇奪其中九個獎項，當中包括兩項極具份量的大獎，成績斐然（見附件）。

「Martin Barnes」獎項由英國土木工程師學會轄下的新工程合約組織頒發，旨在表揚世界各地的工程項目、機構及個別人士，以夥伴協作方式推動工程項目的優秀表現，是業界極具權威的榮譽。

兩項大獎分別是：

1.「氣候變化應對方案」大獎：由水務署石湖墟再造水廠工程項目摘得。在建造及營運香港首座大型區域性再造水廠時，水務署透過新工程合約機制，與承建商共同研究一套創新而具成本效益的全自動再造水生產方案，節能之餘亦有助減碳，而其生產過程更免受極端氣候影響，為北區及鄰近新發展區供應非飲用用途的再造水，不單節省珍貴食水，亦增加本港水資源組合的韌性，進一步提升香港水資源的整體穩定性。

2.「卓越貢獻」大獎：由發展局副秘書長（工務）何英傑摘得，表揚其多年來致力於工程項目推動及深化新工程合約的應用，表現卓越，有效促進業界協作文化，並積極推動運用創新科技，以持續提升工程項目的整體表現。

除上述兩項大獎外，發展局、土木工程拓展署、渠務署、機電工程署和路政署亦憑藉多個標誌性的新工程合約項目獲得不同獎項。

發展局局長甯漢豪祝賀工務團隊取得令人振奮的成績。她說：「發展局及工務部門一直致力透過採用『新工程合約』模式，推動以夥伴協作方式推行工務工程，增強業界不同持份者之間的互信與合作，有助實現項目管理的主要目標，提升項目的管理效率和成本效益。今次獲獎，充分顯示團隊的努力和成果得到國際肯定。」

頒獎禮同日，新工程合約組織亦舉行二○二五年度會議，機電工程署署長潘國英應邀出席專題研討環節，與一眾國際專家交流，分享如何引領業界應用創新技術，融合新工程合約的運用，令基建項目推展更有成效。

「新工程合約」模式自二○○九年由發展局引入香港工務工程以來，已成為推動業界升級轉型的重要引擎。「新工程合約」倡議業主和承建商以夥伴協作精神互動，從而提升工程項目表現。傳統合約較着重在合約條款列明雙方的義務和責任，而「新工程合約」則在合約條款引入一套完整的項目管理系統，包括風險預警機制、合約方之間的補償機制和行動時間表，提倡合約各方以積極協作的態度，攜手按這套管理系統解決合約問題，達致雙贏。至今已有超過760項工務工程項目採用「新工程合約」模式，合約總值超過5,100億港元。

title: 紅磡致命交通意外
news_content:
警方正調查今日（六月十七日）在紅磡發生的致命交通意外，意外中一名女子死亡。

早上約六時三十二分，一輛中型貨車沿平治街南行，當駛至近佛光街一巴士站時，據報撞倒一名五十歲女子及一名三十三歲女子。該名司機其後逃去。

該名五十歲女途人被困於車底，由消防救出。她頭部嚴重受傷，昏迷被送往伊利沙伯醫院治理，於早上七時十分被證實死亡。該名三十三歲女途人手及腳受傷，清醒被送往伊利沙伯醫院治理。

經進一步調查後，一名三十四歲非華裔男子涉嫌危險駕駛引致他人死亡被捕，現正被扣留調查。

西九龍總區交通部特別調查隊正跟進調查案件。

任何人如目睹意外發生或有資料提供，請致電三六六一 九〇六二與調查人員聯絡。

title: Fatal traffic accident in Hung Hom
news_content:
Police are investigating a fatal traffic accident happened in Hung Hom today (June 17), in which a woman died.
 
 At about 6.32am, a medium goods vehicle (MGV) was travelling along Ping Chi Street southbound. When approaching a bus stop near Fat Kwong Street, it reportedly knocked down a 50-year-old woman and a 33-year-old woman. The driver then fled the scene.
 
 The 50-year-old female pedestrian was trapped under the MGV and rescued by firemen. Sustaining serious head injuries, she was rushed to Queen Elizabeth Hospital in unconscious state and certified dead at 7.10am. Sustaining hand and leg injuries, the 33-year-old female pedestrian was rushed to Queen Elizabeth Hospital in conscious state.
 
 After further investigations, a 34-year-old man was arrested for dangerous driving causing death. He is being detained for further enquiries.

 Investigation by the Special Investigation Team of Traffic, Kowloon West is underway.
 
 Anyone who witnessed the accident or has any information to offer is urged to contact the investigating officers on 3661 9062.

title: ​一名入境旅客管有未完稅香煙罪成判囚（附圖）
news_content:
一名入境女旅客因管有未完稅香煙和未有向海關人員作出申報，違反《應課稅品條例》（《條例》），今日（六月十七日）在粉嶺裁判法院被判處監禁三個月和罰款一千元。

海關人員於五月二十九日在羅湖管制站截查該名三十九歲抵港女旅客，在其攜帶的個人行李內檢獲九千六百支未完稅香煙，估計市值約三萬九千元，應課稅值約三萬二千元。該名旅客隨即被捕。

海關對判刑表示歡迎，監禁判刑具相當阻嚇作用，並反映罪行的嚴重性。海關提醒市民，根據《條例》，煙草屬應課稅品。任何人士若處理、管有、售賣或購買私煙，即屬違法，一經定罪，最高可被判罰款一百萬元及監禁兩年。

市民可致電海關二十四小時熱線182 8080，或透過舉報罪案專用電郵帳戶（crimereport@customs.gov.hk）或網上表格（eform.cefs.gov.hk/form/ced002）舉報懷疑私煙活動。

title: Incoming passenger convicted and jailed for possessing duty-not-paid cigarettes (with photo)
news_content:
An incoming female passenger was sentenced to three months' imprisonment and fined $1,000 at the Fanling Magistrates' Courts today (June 17) for possessing duty-not-paid cigarettes and failing to declare them to Customs officers, in contravention of the Dutiable Commodities Ordinance (DCO).

Customs officers intercepted the 39-year-old incoming female passenger at the Lo Wu Control Point on May 29 and seized 9 600 duty-not-paid cigarettes with an estimated market value of about $39,000 and a duty potential of about $32,000 from her personal baggage. The passenger was subsequently arrested.

Customs welcomes the sentence. The custodial sentence has imposed a considerable deterrent effect and reflects the seriousness of the offences. Customs reminds members of the public that under the DCO, tobacco products are dutiable goods to which the DCO applies. Any person who deals with, possesses, sells or buys illicit cigarettes commits an offence. The maximum penalty upon conviction is a fine of $1 million and imprisonment for two years.

Members of the public may report any suspected illicit cigarette activities to Customs' 24-hour hotline 182 8080 or its dedicated crime-reporting email account (crimereport@customs.gov.hk) or online form (eform.cefs.gov.hk/form/ced002).

title: 日本進口水產的檢測情況
news_content:
因應日本政府單方面決定把福島核電站核污水排放大海，食物環境衞生署署長已發出《食物安全命令》，禁止源自日本10（都）縣的水產、海鹽和海藻食品進口本港，受禁（都）縣包括東京、福島、茨城、宮城、千葉、群馬、栃木、新潟、長野和埼玉。

至於其他未有被禁止輸入香港的日本水產、海鹽和海藻，為確保食物安全，食物環境衞生署轄下食物安全中心（食安中心）正全面進行輻射水平測試；在確認相關產品沒有超出輻射水平的情況下，才放行於市場供應。

由六月十六日中午截至今日（六月十七日）中午，食安中心已對235個日本進口「水產及其製品、海藻及海鹽」的食物樣本作輻射水平檢測，未有發現輻射水平超出安全標準。詳情可參閱食安中心「日本進口食品管制措施」專題網頁（www.cfs.gov.hk/tc_chi/programme/programme_rafs/programme_rafs_fc_01_30_Nuclear_Event_and_Food_Safety.html）。

同期，漁農自然護理署（漁護署）已對50個本地漁產品樣本作輻射水平檢測，全部樣本檢測合格。詳情可參閱漁護署網頁（www.afcd.gov.hk/tc_chi/fisheries/Radiological_testing/Radiological_Test.html）。

香港天文台亦已加強監測本港水域的環境輻射水平。至目前為止，並沒有發現異常情況。詳情可參閱香港天文台的網頁（www.hko.gov.hk/tc/radiation/monitoring/seawater.html）。

由二○二三年八月二十四日起至今日中午，食安中心及漁護署分別檢測了共144 314個日本進口食物樣本（包括94 829個水產及其製品、海藻及海鹽樣本）及共32 990個本地漁產品樣本作輻射水平檢測，全部樣本檢測合格。

title: Inspection of aquatic products imported from Japan
news_content:
In response to the Japanese Government's plan to discharge nuclear-contaminated water at the Fukushima Nuclear Power Station, the Director of Food and Environmental Hygiene issued a Food Safety Order which prohibits all aquatic products, sea salt and seaweeds originating from the 10 metropolis/prefectures, namely Tokyo, Fukushima, Ibaraki, Miyagi, Chiba, Gunma, Tochigi, Niigata, Nagano and Saitama, from being imported into and supplied in Hong Kong.

  For other Japanese aquatic products, sea salt and seaweeds that are not prohibited from being imported into Hong Kong, the Centre for Food Safety (CFS) of the Food and Environmental Hygiene Department is conducting comprehensive radiological tests to verify that the radiation levels of these products do not exceed the guideline levels before they are allowed to be supplied in the market.

  From noon on June 16 to noon today (June 17), the CFS conducted tests on the radiological levels of 235 food samples imported from Japan, which were of the "aquatic and related products, seaweeds and sea salt" category. No sample was found to have exceeded the safety limit. Details can be found on the CFS's thematic website titled "Control Measures on Foods Imported from Japan" (www.cfs.gov.hk/english/programme/programme_rafs/programme_rafs_fc_01_30_Nuclear_Event_and_Food_Safety.html).

  In parallel, the Agriculture, Fisheries and Conservation Department (AFCD) has also tested 50 samples of local catch for radiological levels. All the samples passed the tests. Details can be found on the AFCD's website (www.afcd.gov.hk/english/fisheries/Radiological_testing/Radiological_Test.html).

  The Hong Kong Observatory (HKO) has also enhanced the environmental monitoring of the local waters. No anomaly has been detected so far. For details, please refer to the HKO's website (www.hko.gov.hk/en/radiation/monitoring/seawater.html).

  From August 24, 2023, to noon today, the CFS and the AFCD have conducted tests on the radiological levels of 144 314 samples of food imported from Japan (including 94 829 samples of aquatic and related products, seaweeds and sea salt) and 32 990 samples of local catch respectively. All the samples passed the tests.

title: 政務司副司長出席銀髮經濟發展聯盟成立典禮暨圓桌會議致辭（只有中文）（附圖）
news_content:
以下是政務司副司長卓永興今日（六月十七日）出席銀髮經濟發展聯盟成立典禮暨圓桌會議的致辭：

李世榮議員（立法會議員）、陳學鋒議員（立法會議員）、管浩鳴議員（立法會議員）、陳沛良議員（立法會議員）、何啟明副局長（勞工及福利局副局長）、各位顧問、各位嘉賓：

今天很高興出席銀髮經濟發展聯盟（發展聯盟）成立典禮暨圓桌會議。首先，我要恭賀發展聯盟的成立，亦感謝發展聯盟、在座的專家學者、業界領袖及所有參與者，以實際行動支持特區政府在促進銀髮經濟的工作。

高齡化的情況在全球日趨嚴峻，香港的情況更是令人關注。面對人口結構轉變的新形勢，我們必須積極應對高齡化帶來的各種挑戰，並在挑戰中抓緊發展機遇，積極探索新產業、新業態，在變局中打開香港新天地。有見及此，行政長官在二○二四年《施政報告》提出成立促進銀髮經濟工作組（工作組），由我及商務及經濟發展局局長分別擔任組長和副組長。經深入探討並與業界及持份者協商後，工作組早前就五大範疇公布了30項措施。

我很高興看到不同業界及持份者對於工作組推出的措施均反應正面，今日成立的發展聯盟正是一個積極回應的好例子。我了解發展聯盟正籌備推廣軟餐、推動餐飲業界採用《照護食標準指引》，以及與餐飲集團、社福機構合作舉辦軟餐食品展等。這些舉措均與工作組在促進「銀色消費」和推廣「銀色品質保證」兩個範疇下推出的措施不謀而合，在便利長者品嚐美食之餘，亦可拉動銀髮族的消費，和以認證方式增加產品和服務的認受性，從而拓展銷售。

除了促進「銀色消費」和推廣「銀色品質保證」，工作組亦在其他三個範疇推出措施，包括發展「銀色產業」、推廣「銀色財務及保障安排」和釋放「銀色生產動力」，目標是發展銀色相關的產品和服務、善用和保障長者的財政資源，以及吸引長者投入勞動市場加強社會的生產力。在推廣「銀色財務及保障安排」方面，我得悉發展聯盟曾約見銀行業，共同探討銀髮金融產品。我樂見在政府推動下，社會重視銀髮經濟的風氣漸成。銀髮經濟的發展不僅關乎長者的福祉，更關乎整個社會的可持續發展。政府需要社會各界的積極協作與行動，才能實現銀髮經濟的最大效益。

我期望工作組能與發展聯盟一同推動各項促進銀髮經濟的工作，發揮加乘作用。我相信，在發展聯盟的帶動下，各界定會繼續推出更多惠及銀髮一族的措施，把握銀髮經濟帶來的機遇，帶動整體經濟發展，並在生活各個範疇提升長者的生活質素，增加他們的獲得感、幸福感。

我再次衷心恭賀發展聯盟的成立，並祝今天的活動圓滿成功，所有參與者都能夠收穫滿滿。

謝謝大家！

title: 運輸及物流局局長訪問上海（附圖）
news_content:
運輸及物流局局長陳美寶訪問上海兩日，就運輸物流等議題與當地官員及業界會面。

她昨日（六月十六日）抵埗後，先與上海市交通委員會主任于福林一行會面，就雙方關注的議題，包括交通運輸管理、航運、航空等交流意見，並參觀了四月開始營運的純電動渡輪，了解上海綠色交通的推展情況。

她又與中國船東協會代表會面，介紹香港海運服務業的最新發展，並鼓勵內地船東及航運企業把船舶在香港註冊。以船舶註冊地來說，香港全球第四，「香港旗」的品質一直享譽國際，港口滯留率維持在全球三甲之內。另外，特區政府將設立大宗商品貿易稅務優惠，進一步為海運服務業注入動力，結合國家船東及航運業界的市場影響力，助力加強國家在國際航運社區的影響力。

陳美寶今日（六月十七日）到上海洋山港進行考察，了解自動化碼頭的運作。她說：「上海港和香港港口不約而同地朝着綠色化、數字化、智慧化方向發展，是次考察加深了雙方就港口高質量發展的交流，亦讓我們借鏡洋山港的經驗，促進與碼頭營辦商商討香港港口邁向智能化的路線圖。上海港以科技引領港口發展，我期待日後進一步深化與上海港的交流合作，鞏固提升香港作為國家『南大門』的實力。」

她續指，上海和香港同為國家重要的航運中心，在《2024新華．波羅的海國際航運中心發展指數報告》分別位列第三及第四位，期望藉是次交流考察，共同為國家的航運強國戰略目標而努力，探討深化合作的機遇。

陳美寶已結束訪滬行程，並於今日下午返抵香港。

title: ​財經事務及庫務局局長在香港綠色建築議會午餐會主題演講全文（只有中文）
news_content:
以下是財經事務及庫務局（財庫局）局長許正宇今日（六月十七日）在香港綠色建築議會午餐會的主題演講全文：

張博士（香港綠色建築議會主席張天祥博士）、各位嘉賓、各位朋友：

大家好。感謝香港綠色建築議會的邀請，讓我有機會與各位交流，分享香港在推動綠色建築、綠色金融，以及可持續發展方面的最新進展與政策方向。

多年來，香港綠色建築議會一直致力推動本港綠色建築的標準與實踐，提升社會對可持續建築的關注與認知，並為香港這個高度城市化的地區提供具體可行的轉型方案。這些努力不單是建築層面的變革，更是香港邁向二○五○年前實現碳中和目標的重要基石。

綠色發展對金融聲譽至關重要

綠色發展已經不再是選項，而是全球共識。在這個背景下，香港綠色建築議會的工作，不僅有助於減碳，更為香港在國際排名中注入綠色動能。

根據《全球金融中心指數》（GFCI），香港在今年三月公布的最新報告中繼續穩居全球第三位，領先亞太地區。除了傳統金融實力外，環境永續的表現也日益受到重視。報告中納入了多項與綠色建築與排放相關的指標，包括「綠色未來指數」、「能源可持續性指數」以及「可持續城市指數」等，當中涵蓋了LEED（領先能源與環境設計）認證建築數目、人均碳排放、溫室氣體總排放等具體數據。

換言之，綠色建築不僅影響我們的生活質素，也關乎香港作為國際城市的整體競爭力與金融聲譽。

香港綠色資本市場處於領導地位

香港作為國際金融中心，也正積極邁向國際綠色金融中心的目標。根據最新數字，二○二四年在香港安排發行的綠色與可持續債務總額超過840億美元，當中僅綠色與可持續債券就達430億美元，連續七年居亞洲首位，佔地區總額約百分之四十五，充分反映出香港在綠色資本市場的領導地位。

我們自二○一九年推出現今名為「政府可持續債券計劃」，至今，已成功發行合共約2,400億港元的政府綠色債券，所募集的資金分配予多個環保基建與氣候適應項目，其中超過一半屬於綠色建築。我們期望通過提升建築物的可持續發展表現，減少溫室氣體排放，並減緩氣候變化。

為鼓勵更多企業參與綠色融資，我們亦推出了「綠色和可持續金融資助計劃」，截至今年五月，已批出3.4億港元資助，涵蓋超過570筆綠色與可持續債務工具，涉及金額超過1,600億美元。

培養人才與支持科技創新

綠色建築的推動離不開人才與科技的支撐。政府已延長「綠色和可持續金融培訓先導計劃」至二○二八年，資助從業員、學生及專業人士修讀相關課程。至今已批出逾7 200宗申請，資助總額超過4,000萬港元。

同時，我們亦積極推動綠色金融科技的應用。去年，我們推出全新的「綠色和可持續金融科技概念驗證測試資助計劃」，資助初創企業與研究機構開發解決行業痛點的創新方案。首輪計劃已資助39個申請者、共60個項目，每個項目獲資助15萬港元，推動方案的商業化與落地。

與國際接軌推動可持續披露生態圈

上星期，國際財務報告準則基金會（IFRS基金會）確認香港為首批以全面採用國際財務報告可持續披露準則（ISSB準則）為目標的司法管轄區，顯示香港致力提升資本市場就可持續發展的資訊透明度，便利投資者作出投資決策，促進全球資金融通。

一直以來，財庫局致力推動香港建立一個全面、透明、備受國際認可的可持續披露生態圈。去年三月，我們發表了願景宣言，明確表達香港在可持續金融發展方面的長遠目標與堅定決心。其後，香港會計師公會亦已在去年底發布《香港可持續披露準則》，全面銜接ISSB準則，並將於今年八月一日正式生效。

與此同時，我們也公布了《香港可持續披露路線圖》，為大型公眾責任實體在二○二八年前全面採用ISSB準則提供清晰的過渡安排。這些舉措不僅為企業提供明確指引，也進一步鞏固香港作為全球綠色金融領導者的角色；同時亦有助提升企業透明度與國際投資者信心，從而為綠色建築、可持續發展項目創造更多融資機會，加速實現城市低碳轉型與高質量發展。

香港可持續金融分類目錄

為協助業界識別綠色及可持續的經濟活動，並促進相關的資金融通，香港金融管理局（金管局）於去年五月發表「香港可持續金融分類目錄」，當中明確納入了由香港綠色建築議會認證的綠建環評（BEAM Plus）和「零碳就緒建築認證計劃」，推動持份者設定和實行碳中和目標。為協助銀行和業主判斷擬進行的建設或翻新項目是否符合金管局分類目錄標準，香港綠色建築議會推出了「綠色金融分類目錄合格申報服務」，以支持這些綠色金融倡議。

結語

各位嘉賓、各位朋友，建築是城市的骨架，而綠色建築則是我們未來生活質素的保障。香港的綠色金融發展與綠色建築推動息息相關，兩者相輔相成。透過政府和業界的協作，我們有信心香港不單止繼續在國際舞台上鞏固其國際金融中心的地位，更能成為綠色城市的典範，為我們的下一代建構一個可持續、更宜居的家園。謝謝大家。

title: Security Bureau reminds public to be vigilant against suspicious calls purportedly made by Security Bureau staff
news_content:
The Security Bureau today (June 17) alerted members of the public to stay vigilant against suspicious calls purportedly made by Security Bureau staff, alleging that the citizen was suspected of breaking the law and required to visit the Security Bureau office in person for verification.

The Security Bureau solemnly clarified that this is untrue and condemned such deception tactics. The Security Bureau has displayed an alert message on its official website to remind the public to stay vigilant against scams.

âMembers of the public are reminded not to disclose their personal information to any suspicious or unidentified individuals and, in case of doubt, to call the Anti Scam Helpline 18222 for enquiries. Those who have provided personal information to suspicious individuals orsuspect they have been scammed should contact the Police.
